vr-section.description: Discover sci-fi worlds in an immersive VR adventure. Futuristic visuals, new mechanics, and endless fun.

klee-section.description: Discover our innovative line of early stimulation mobile apps, specially designed for children aged 3 to 5. Each app offers educational, playful, and safe experiences that enhance cognitive, emotional, and motor development through play and exploration.

othergames-section.description-01: Be quick! Keep the beaver ahead of the sinking path.
othergames-section.description-02: The next miniature strategy game. Control your tank and dominate the battlefield.

vr-page.tittle: Virtual Reality like you've never experienced before
vr-page.desc-1: At Manguita Studio we develop immersive, stylized VR experiences tailored to each client's needs. Our specialty is transforming ideas into powerful virtual realities that resonate with audiences.
vr-page.desc-2: Our approach is 100% personalized. We can integrate into your development team as an external studio or take on the entire project from scratch. We handle art, programming, optimization, and technical compatibility for various VR platforms.
vr-page.desc-3: Logic and creativity are your best weapons. Dare to solve virtual challenges with friends, family, or coworkers. Will you succeed before time runs out?
